title: Restrictions (iOS) (com.apple.applicationaccess)
description: The payload that configures restrictions on a device.

allowCamera.title: Allow Camera Use
allowCamera.description: If 'false', the system disables the camera and removes its icon from the Home Screen, and users are unable to take photographs. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowedCameraRestrictionBundleIDs.title: Allowed Exceptions to Camera Restriction
allowedCameraRestrictionBundleIDs.description: If present, the system exempts apps with bundle IDs in the array from the 'allowCamera' restriction. The system doesn't grant these apps access to the camera automatically; they're only exempted from the 'allowCamera' restriction. This key has no effect when the camera isn't restricted. Multiple payloads combine using an intersect operation. Requires a supervised device.

allowVideoConferencing.title: Allow Video Conferencing
allowVideoConferencing.description: If 'false', the system hides the FaceTime app. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

allowCloudBackup.title: Allow iCloud Backup
allowCloudBackup.description: If 'false', the system disables backing up the device to iCloud. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowCloudPhotoLibrary.title: Allow iCloud Photo Library
allowCloudPhotoLibrary.description: If 'false', the system disables iCloud Photo Library. The system removes any photos from local storage that aren't fully downloaded from iCloud Photo Library to the device. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices and with Managed Apple Accounts is deprecated.

allowPhotoStream.title: Allow Photo Stream
allowPhotoStream.description: If 'false', the system disables Photo Stream.

allowSharedStream.title: Allow Shared Stream
allowSharedStream.description: If 'false', the system disables Shared Photo Stream. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowPasswordAutoFill.title: Allow password AutoFill
allowPasswordAutoFill.description:
If 'false', the system disables:

- The AutoFill Passwords feature in iOS, with Keychain and third-party password managers
- Prompting the user to use a saved password in Safari or in apps
- Automatic strong passwords
- Suggesting strong passwords to users

However, if 'false', the system doesn't prevent AutoFill for contact info and credit cards in Safari.

allowAutoUnlock.title: Allow Apple Watch to auto unlock device
allowAutoUnlock.description: If 'false', the system disallows auto unlock. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowFingerprintForUnlock.title: Allow Touch ID to Unlock Device
allowFingerprintForUnlock.description: If 'false', the system prevents Touch ID, Face ID, or Optic ID from unlocking a device. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowBookstore.title: Allow Bookstore
allowBookstore.description: If 'false', the system removes the Book Store tab from the Books app.

allowChat.title: Allow use of iMessage
allowChat.description: If 'false', the system disables the use of iMessage with supervised devices. If the device supports text messaging, the user can still send and receive text messages.

allowiTunes.title: Allow use of iTunes
allowiTunes.description: If 'false', the system disables the iTunes Music Store and removes its icon from the Home Screen. Users can't preview, purchase, or download content. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

allowMusicService.title: Allow Apple Music
allowMusicService.description: If 'false', the system disables the Music service, and the Music app reverts to classic mode.

allowRadioService.title: Allow iTunes Radio
allowRadioService.description: If 'false', the system disables Apple Music Radio.

allowYouTube.title: Allow Apple's YouTube
allowYouTube.description: This key is ignored on iOS 6 and later because the YouTube app is no longer built in.

allowAppsToBeHidden.title: Allow Hiding Apps
allowAppsToBeHidden.description: If 'false', disables the ability for the user to hide apps. It doesn't affect the user's ability to leave it in the App Library, while removing it from the Home Screen.

allowAppsToBeLocked.title: Allow Locking Apps
allowAppsToBeLocked.description: If 'false', disables the ability for the user to lock apps. Because hiding apps also requires locking them, disallowing locking also disallows hiding.

allowCloudDocumentSync.title: Allow iCloud Document Sync
allowCloudDocumentSync.description: If 'false', the system disables document and key-value syncing to iCloud. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later, and Shared iPad doesn't support it. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices and with Managed Apple Accounts is deprecated.

allowCloudKeychainSync.title: Allow iCloud Keychain
allowCloudKeychainSync.description: If 'false', the system disables iCloud Keychain synchronization. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices and with Managed Apple Accounts is deprecated.

allowDefinitionLookup.title: Allow definition lookup
allowDefinitionLookup.description: If 'false', the system disables definition lookup.

allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.title: Allow accessing websites using TLS 1.0 and 1.1
allowDeprecatedWebKitTLS.description: Allow websites that use TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1 to be accessed using Safari.

allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery.title: Allow discovery of AirPrint printers using iBeacons
allowAirPrintiBeaconDiscovery.description: If 'false', the system disables iBeacon discovery of AirPrint printers, which prevents spurious AirPrint Bluetooth beacons from phishing for network traffic.

forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement.title: Disallow AirPrint to destinations with untrusted certificates
forceAirPrintTrustedTLSRequirement.description: If 'true', the system requires trusted certificates for TLS printing communication.

allowScreenShot.title: Allow Screenshots and Screen Recording
allowScreenShot.description: If 'false', the system disables saving a screenshot of the display and capturing a screen recording. It also disables the Classroom app from observing remote screens.

allowRemoteScreenObservation.title: Allow Remote Screen Observation
allowRemoteScreenObservation.description: If 'false', the system disables remote screen observation by the Classroom app. Nest this key beneath 'allowScreenShot' as a subrestriction. If 'allowScreenShot' is 'false', the Classroom app doesn't observe remote screens. Requires a supervised device until iOS 13 and macOS 10.15. Allowed for user enrollments in macOS 12 and later.

forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.title: Allow Classroom app to perform AirPlay and View Screen without prompting
forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservatio.description: If 'true' and 'ScreenObservationPermissionModificationAllowed' is also 'true' in the Education payload, a student enrolled in a managed course through the Classroom app automatically gives permission to that course teacher's requests to observe the student's screen without prompting the student.

forceUnpromptedManagedClassroomScreenObs.description: Deprecated in iOS 11. Use forceClassroomUnpromptedScreenObservation instead.

allowVoiceDialing.title: Allow Voice Dialing While Device is Locked
allowVoiceDialing.description: If 'false', the system disables voice dialing if the device is locked with a passcode.

allowAssistantWhileLocked.title: Allow Siri While Locked
allowAssistantWhileLocked.description: If 'false', the system disables Siri when the device is locked. The system ignores this restriction if the device doesn't have a passcode set.

forceAssistantProfanityFilter.title: Enable Siri Profanity Filter
forceAssistantProfanityFilter.description: If 'true', the system forces the use of the profanity filter for Siri and dictation. Requires a supervised device in iOS.

allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.title: Show user-generated content in Siri
allowAssistantUserGeneratedContent.description: If 'false', the system prevents Siri from querying user-generated content from the web.

allowSiriServerLogging.title: Allow server-side logging of Siri commands
allowSiriServerLogging.description: Allow server-side logging of Siri commands

allowSpotlightInternetResults.title: Allow Siri Suggestions
allowSpotlightInternetResults.description: If 'false', the system disables Spotlight Internet search results in Siri Suggestions. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowAppInstallation.title: Allow App Installation
allowAppInstallation.description:
If 'false', the system disables the App Store and removes its icon from the Home Screen. Users are unable to install or update their apps. This applies to App Store apps, marketplace apps, and locally installed apps (using Configurator, Xcode, and so forth).

In iOS 10 and later, MDM commands can override this restriction. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

allowUIAppInstallation.title: Allow App Installation from App Store
allowUIAppInstallation.description:
If 'false', the system disables the App Store and removes its icon from the Home Screen. However, users can continue to install or update their apps either locally (via Configurator, Xcode, and so forth), or using alternative marketplace apps.

In iOS 10 and later, MDM commands can override this restriction.

allowAutomaticAppDownloads.title: Allow Automatic App Downloads
allowAutomaticAppDownloads.description: If 'false', the system prevents automatic downloading of apps purchased on other devices. This setting doesn't affect updates to existing apps.

allowMarketplaceAppInstallation.title: Allow App Installation from alternative marketplaces
allowMarketplaceAppInstallation.description: If 'false', the system prevents installation of alternative marketplace apps from the web and prevents any installed alternative marketplace apps from installing apps.

allowWebDistributionAppInstallation.title: Allow App Installation from web sites
allowWebDistributionAppInstallation.description: If 'false', the device prevents installation of apps directly from the web.

allowAppRemoval.title: Allow App Removal
allowAppRemoval.description: If 'false', the system disables removal of apps from an iOS device. This applies to App Store apps, marketplace apps, and locally installed apps (using Configurator, Xcode, and so forth).

allowAppClips.title: Allow App Clips
allowAppClips.description: If 'false', the system prevents a user from adding any App Clips, and removes any existing App Clips on the device.

allowSystemAppRemoval.title: Allow removing system apps
allowSystemAppRemoval.description: If 'false', the system disables the removal of system apps from the device.

allowInAppPurchases.title: Allow In App Purchases
allowInAppPurchases.description: If 'false', the system prohibits in-app purchasing. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

forceITunesStorePasswordEntry.title: Require iTunes password for all purchases
forceITunesStorePasswordEntry.description: If 'true', the system forces the user to enter their iTunes password for each transaction.

allowManagedAppsCloudSync.title: Allow iCloud Sync for Managed Apps
allowManagedAppsCloudSync.description: If 'false', the system prevents managed apps from using iCloud sync.

allowEnterpriseBookBackup.title: Allow Enterprise Books Backup
allowEnterpriseBookBackup.description: If 'false', the system disables backup of Enterprise books.

allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync.title: Allow Enterprise Books Notes and Highlights Sync
allowEnterpriseBookMetadataSync.description: If 'false', the system disables sync of Enterprise books, notes, and highlights.

allowCloudPrivateRelay.title: Allow iCloud Private Relay
allowCloudPrivateRelay.description: If 'false', the system disables iCloud Private Relay. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices and with Managed Apple Accounts is deprecated.

allowGlobalBackgroundFetchWhenRoaming.title: Allow Automatic Sync While Roaming
allowGlobalBackgroundFetchWhenRoaming.description: If 'false', the system disables global background fetch activity when an iOS phone is roaming. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

forceEncryptedBackup.title: Force Encrypted Backups
forceEncryptedBackup.description: If 'true', the system encrypts all backups.

allowEraseContentAndSettings.title: Allow Erase All Content and Settings
allowEraseContentAndSettings.description: If 'false', the system disables the Erase All Content and Settings option in the Reset UI.

forcePreserveESIMOnErase.title: Force Preserve ESIM on Erase
forcePreserveESIMOnErase.description:
If 'true', the system preserves eSIM when it erases the device due to too many failed password attempts or the Erase All Content and Settings option in Settings > General > Reset.

Note:
The system doesn't preserve eSIM if Find My initiates erasing the device.

allowUntrustedTLSPrompt.title: Allow user to accept untrusted TLS certificates
allowUntrustedTLSPrompt.description: If 'false', the system automatically rejects untrusted HTTPS certificates without prompting the user.

allowEnterpriseAppTrust.title: Allow Trusting Enterprise Apps
allowEnterpriseAppTrust.description: If 'false', the system removes the Trust Enterprise Developer button in Settings > General > VPN & Device Management, which prevents provisioning apps by universal provisioning profiles. This restriction applies to free developer accounts and enterprise app developers that aren't implicitly trusted by apps that install through MDM. This restriction doesn't revoke previously granted trust.

allowOTAPKIUpdates.title: Allow automatic updates to certificate trust settings
allowOTAPKIUpdates.description: If 'false', the system disables over-the-air PKI updates. Setting this restriction to 'false' doesn't disable CRL and OCSP checks.

allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallation.title: Allow UI Configuration Profile Installation
allowUIConfigurationProfileInstallation.description: If 'false', the system prohibits the user from installing configuration profiles and certificates interactively.

allowVPNCreation.title: Allow Adding VPN Configurations (Supervised devices only)
allowVPNCreation.description: If 'false', the system allows only managed apps to create VPN configurations. Prior to iOS 18, the system also allows unmanaged apps to create VPN configurations.

forceAutomaticDateAndTime.title: Force automatic date and time
forceAutomaticDateAndTime.description: If 'true', the system enables the Set Automatically feature in Date & Time and the user can't disable it. The system updates the device's time zone only when the device can determine its location using a cellular connection or Wi-Fi with location services enabled.

forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.title: Allow Classroom to lock apps or the device without prompting
forceClassroomUnpromptedAppAndDeviceLock.description: If 'true', the system allows the teacher to lock apps or the device without prompting the student.

forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.title: Automatically join Classroom classes without prompting
forceClassroomAutomaticallyJoinClasses.description: If 'true', the system automatically gives permission to the teacher's requests without prompting the student.

forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.title: Require teacher permission to leave Classroom app unmanaged classes
forceClassroomRequestPermissionToLeaveCl.description: If 'true', a student enrolled in an unmanaged course through Classroom needs to request permission from the teacher to leave the course.

allowAccountModification.title: Allow modifying account settings
allowAccountModification.description: If 'false', the system disables modification of accounts, such as Apple Accounts, and internet-based accounts, such as Mail, Contacts, and Calendar.

allowBluetoothModification.title: Allow modifying Bluetooth settings
allowBluetoothModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents modification of Bluetooth settings.

allowAppCellularDataModification.title: Allow Modifying Cellular Data Usage for Apps Settings
allowAppCellularDataModification.description: If 'false', the system disables changing settings for cellular data usage for apps.

allowCellularPlanModification.title: Allow modifying celluar plan settings
allowCellularPlanModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents users from changing settings related to their cellular plan (available only on select carriers).

allowESIMModification.title: Allow eSIM Modification
allowESIMModification.description: If 'false', the system disables modifications of eSIMs.

allowFindMyFriendsModification.title: Allow modifying Find My Friends settings
allowFindMyFriendsModification.description: If 'false', the system disables changes to Find My Friends.

allowNotificationsModification.title: Allow Modifying Notifications Settings
allowNotificationsModification.description: If 'false', the system disables modification of notification settings.

allowPasscodeModification.title: Allow Modifying Passcode
allowPasscodeModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents adding, changing, or removing the passcode. The system ignores this restriction on Shared iPad.

allowFingerprintModification.title: Allow modifying Touch ID / Face ID
allowFingerprintModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from modifying Touch ID or Face ID.

allowEnablingRestrictions.title: Allow Configuring Restrictions or ScreenTime
allowEnablingRestrictions.description: If 'false', the system disables the Enable Restrictions option in the Restrictions UI in Settings. If 'false' in iOS 12 and later, the system disables the Enable ScreenTime option in the ScreenTime UI in Settings and disables ScreenTime if already enabled.

allowWallpaperModification.title: Allow Modifying Wallpaper
allowWallpaperModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents changing the wallpaper.

allowUSBRestrictedMode.title: Allow USB Restricted Mode
allowUSBRestrictedMode.description: If 'false', the system allows iOS devices to always connect to USB accessories while locked. In macOS, allows new USB and Thunderbolt accessories, and SD cards to connect without authorization. If the system has Lockdown mode enabled, it ignores this value. This restriction is not supported on the user channel.

allowHostPairing.title: Allow pairing with non-Configurator hosts
allowHostPairing.description: If 'false', the system disables host pairing with the exception of the supervision host. If there's no configured supervision host certificate, the system disables all pairing. Host pairing lets the administrator control whether an iOS device can pair with a host Mac or PC.

allowiPhoneWidgetsOnMac.title: Allow iPhone widget on Mac
allowiPhoneWidgetsOnMac.description: If 'false', the system disallows iPhone widgets on a Mac that signs in with the same Apple Account for iCloud.

allowUnpairedExternalBootToRecovery.title: Allow booting into recovery by unpaired devices
allowUnpairedExternalBootToRecovery.description: If 'true', the system allows unpaired devices to boot devices into recovery.

allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged.title: Enable allow open from managed to unmanaged
allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged.description: If 'false', documents in managed apps and accounts open only in other managed apps and accounts.

allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged.title: Enable allow open from unmanaged to managed
allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged.description: If 'false', documents in unmanaged apps and accounts open only in other unmanaged apps and accounts.

allowUnmanagedToReadManagedContacts.title: Allow unmanaged apps to read managed contacts accounts
allowUnmanagedToReadManagedContacts.description:
If 'true', the system allows unmanaged apps to read from managed contacts accounts. If 'allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged' is 'true', this restriction has no effect.

Important:
Use MDM to install profiles that contain this restriction.

allowManagedToWriteUnmanagedContacts.title: Allow managed apps to write to managed contacts accounts
allowManagedToWriteUnmanagedContacts.description:
If 'true', the system allows managed apps to write contacts to unmanaged accounts. If 'allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged' is 'true', this restriction has no effect.

Important:
Use MDM to install profiles that contain this restriction.

requireManagedPasteboard.title: Require managed pasteboard
requireManagedPasteboard.description: If 'true', copy-and-paste functionality is limited by the 'allowOpenFromManagedToUnmanaged' and 'allowOpenFromUnmanagedToManaged' restrictions.

forceAirDropUnmanaged.title: Treat AirDrop as Unmanaged Destination
forceAirDropUnmanaged.description: If 'true', the system considers AirDrop to be an unmanaged drop target.

allowActivityContinuation.title: Allow Handoff
allowActivityContinuation.description: If 'false', the system disables activity continuation. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices and with Managed Apple Accounts is deprecated. In a future release, this restriction will begin requiring supervision and will apply to personal Apple Accounts only.

allowDiagnosticSubmission.title: Allow diagnostic submission
allowDiagnosticSubmission.description: If 'false', the system prevents the device from automatically submitting diagnostic reports to Apple.

allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.title: Allow modifying diagnostics settings
allowDiagnosticSubmissionModification.description: If 'false', the system disables changing the diagnostic submission and app analytics settings in the Diagnostics & Usage UI in Settings.

forceAuthenticationBeforeAutoFill.title: Require Touch ID / Face ID authentication before Autofill
forceAuthenticationBeforeAutoFill.description: If 'true', the user needs to authenticate before the system can autofill passwords or credit card information in Safari and apps. If this restriction isn't enforced, the user can toggle this feature in Settings. Only supported on devices with Face ID or Touch ID.

allowPairedWatch.title: Allow Pairing With Apple Watch
allowPairedWatch.description: If 'false', the system disables pairing with an Apple Watch, and the system unpairs any currently paired Apple Watch and erases its content.

forceWatchWristDetection.title: Force Apple Watch Wrist Detection
forceWatchWristDetection.description: If 'true', the system forces a paired Apple Watch to use Wrist Detection.

forceWiFiPowerOn.title: Disallow Wi-Fi from being turned off
forceWiFiPowerOn.description: If 'true', the system prevents turning off Wi-Fi in Settings or Control Center, even by entering or leaving Airplane Mode. It doesn't prevent selecting which Wi-Fi network to use. and later.

forceWiFiToAllowedNetworksOnly.title: Join only Wi-Fi networks installed by a Wi-Fi payload
forceWiFiToAllowedNetworksOnly.description: If 'true', the system limits the device to only join Wi-Fi networks set up through a configuration profile.

forceWiFiWhitelisting.title: Only join Wi-Fi networks installed by profiles

allowProximitySetupToNewDevice.title: Allow setting up new nearby iOS devices
allowProximitySetupToNewDevice.description: If 'false', disables the prompt to set up new devices that are nearby.

allowPredictiveKeyboard.title: Allow Predictive Keyboard
allowPredictiveKeyboard.description: If 'false', the system disables predictive keyboards.

allowKeyboardShortcuts.title: Allow Keyboard Shortcuts
allowKeyboardShortcuts.description: If 'false', the system disables keyboard shortcuts.

allowAutoCorrection.title: Allow Auto Correction
allowAutoCorrection.description: If 'false', the system disables keyboard autocorrection.

allowContinuousPathKeyboard.title: Allow Continuous Path Keyboard
allowContinuousPathKeyboard.description: If 'false', the system disables QuickPath keyboard.

allowSpellCheck.title: Allow Spell Check
allowSpellCheck.description: If 'false', the system disables the keyboard spell checker.

allowSharedDeviceTemporarySession.title: Allow Shared iPad temporary session
allowSharedDeviceTemporarySession.description: If 'false', the system makes temporary sessions unavailable on Shared iPad.

allowDictation.title: Allow dictation
allowDictation.description: If 'false', the system disallows dictation input.

forceOnDeviceOnlyDictation.title: Force on-device only dictation
forceOnDeviceOnlyDictation.description: If 'true', the system disables connections to Siri servers for the purposes of dictation.

forceOnDeviceOnlyTranslation.title: Force on-device only translation
forceOnDeviceOnlyTranslation.description: If 'true', the device can't connect to Siri servers for the purposes of translation.

allowPassbookWhileLocked.title: Allow Wallet While Locked
allowPassbookWhileLocked.description: If 'false', the system hides Passbook notifications from the Lock Screen.

allowPersonalHotspotModification.title: Allow modifying Personal Hotspot settings
allowPersonalHotspotModification.description: If 'false', the system disables modifications of the personal hotspot setting.

allowLiveVoicemail.title: Allow Live Voicemail
allowLiveVoicemail.description: If 'false', the system disables live voicemail on the device.

allowLockScreenControlCenter.title: Show Control Center on Lock screen
allowLockScreenControlCenter.description: If 'false', the system prevents Control Center from appearing on the Lock Screen.

allowLockScreenNotificationsView.title: Show Notification Center on Lock screen
allowLockScreenNotificationsView.description: If 'false', the system disables the Notifications history view on the Lock Screen, so users can't view past notifications. However, they can still see notifications when they arrive.

allowLockScreenTodayView.title: Show Today view on Lock screen
allowLockScreenTodayView.description: If 'false', the system disables the Today view in Notification Center on the Lock Screen.

forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPassw.title: Require passcode on first AirPlay pairing
forceAirPlayOutgoingRequestsPairingPassw.description: If 'true', the system forces all devices receiving AirPlay requests from this device to use a pairing password.

allowAirPrintCredentialsStorage.title: Allow storage of AirPrint credentials in Keychain
allowAirPrintCredentialsStorage.description: If 'false', the system disables Keychain storage of user name and password for AirPrint.

forceLimitAdTracking.title: Force limited ad tracking
forceLimitAdTracking.description: If 'true', the system limits ad tracking. Additionally, it disables app tracking and the Allow Apps to Request to Track setting.

allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising.title: Allow Apple-personalized advertizing
allowApplePersonalizedAdvertising.description: If 'false', the system limits Apple personalized advertising.

allowMailPrivacyProtection.title: Allow mail privacy protection
allowMailPrivacyProtection.description: If 'false', the system disables Mail Privacy Protection on the device.

allowAutoDim.title: Allow Auto Dim
allowAutoDim.description: If 'false', disables auto dim on iPads with OLED displays.

allowGameCenter.title: Allow Game Center
allowGameCenter.description: If 'false', the system disables Game Center, and the system removes its icon from the Home Screen.

allowAddingGameCenterFriends.title: Allow Adding Game Center Friends
allowAddingGameCenterFriends.description: If 'false', the system prohibits adding friends to Game Center. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

allowMultiplayerGaming.title: Allow Multiplayer Gaming
allowMultiplayerGaming.description: If 'false', the system prohibits multiplayer gaming.

allowSafari.title: Allow use of Safari
allowSafari.description: If 'false', the system disables the Safari web browser app, and the system removes its icon from the Home Screen. This setting also prevents users from opening web clips. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

safariAllowAutoFill.title: Allow AutoFill in Safari
safariAllowAutoFill.description:
If 'false', the system disables Safari AutoFill for passwords, contact info, and credit cards, and also prevents using the Keychain for AutoFill. Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later.

Note:
The system still allows third-party password managers, and apps can use AutoFill.

safariForceFraudWarning.title: Enable Fraud Warning
safariForceFraudWarning.description: If 'true', the system enables Safari fraud warning.

safariAllowJavaScript.title: Allow JavaScript
safariAllowJavaScript.description: If 'false', Safari doesn't execute JavaScript. This restriction will require supervision in a future release.

safariAllowPopups.title: Allow Pop-ups
safariAllowPopups.description: If 'false', Safari doesn't allow pop-up windows. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

safariAcceptCookies.title: Accept Cookies in Safari
safariAcceptCookies.description:
Defines the conditions under which the device accepts cookies. The user-facing settings changed in iOS 11, although the possible values remain the same. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated. Allowed values:

- '0': Enables Prevent Cross-Site Tracking and Block All Cookies, and the user canʼt disable either setting.
- '1' or '1.5': Enables Prevent Cross-Site Tracking, and the user canʼt disable it. Doesn't enable Block All Cookies, but the user can enable it.
- '2': Enables Prevent Cross-Site Tracking, but doesn't enable Block All Cookies. The user can toggle either setting.

enum_titles: Never / Prevent Cross-Site Tracking & Block All Cookies (User Restricted)
Allow from current website only / Prevent Cross-Site Tracking (User Restricted)

allowDeviceNameModification.title: Allow Modifying Device Name
allowDeviceNameModification.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from changing the device name.

blockedAppBundleIDs.title: Blocked Apps
blockedAppBundleIDs.description:
If present, the system prevents showing or launching apps with bundle IDs in the array. Include the value 'com.apple.webapp' to restrict all webclips. This applies to App Store apps, marketplace apps, and locally installed apps (using Configurator, Xcode, and so forth).

Note:
Denying system apps may disable other functionality. For example, denying the App Store app may prevent users from accepting the terms and conditions for the user-based Volume Purchase Program (VPP).

allowListedAppBundleIDs.title: Allow Listed Apps
allowListedAppBundleIDs.description: If present, the system only shows or can launch apps with bundle IDs in the array. Include the value 'com.apple.webapp' to allow all webclips. This applies to App Store apps, marketplace apps, and locally installed apps (using Configurator, Xcode, and so forth).

items.title: Apps allow list for Autonomous Single App Mode

autonomousSingleAppModePermittedAppIDs.title: Autonomous Single App Mode Permitted App IDs
autonomousSingleAppModePermittedAppIDs.description: If present, the system allows apps identified by the bundle IDs listed in the array to autonomously enter Single App Mode.

ratingRegion.title: Ratings region
ratingRegion.description: The two-letter key that profile tools use to display the proper ratings for the given region. The client doesn't recognize or report this data.

ratingApps.title: Apps Ranking Number
ratingApps.description:
The maximum level of app content allowed on the device. Preinstalled (first-party) apps ignore this restriction.

Possible values, with the U.S. description of the rating level:

- '1000': All
- '600': 17+
- '300': 12+
- '200': 9+
- '100': 4+
- '0': None

Age bands and the number of discrete age values vary by region, but the values are consistent across regions. For example, in a region that defines rating level 14+, its value is guaranteed to be larger than 300 (12+) and smaller than 600 (17+). Also, the value of rating level 15+ is guaranteed to be larger than the assigned value of rating level 14+. For more information about age ratings, see [Age ratings values and definitions](https://developer.apple.com/help/app-store-connect/reference/age-ratings-values-and-definitions).

Examples of values in other regions include:

- '1000': All
- '621': 21+
- '620': 20+
- '619': 19+
- '618': 18+
- '600': 17+
- '416': 16+
- '415': 15+
- '314': 14+
- '313': 13+
- '300': 12+
- '211': 11+
- '210': 10+
- '200': 9+
- '108': 8+
- '107': 7+
- '106': 6+
- '105': 5+
- '100': 4+
- '3': 3+
- '2': 2+
- '1': 1+
- '0': None

This restriction will require supervision in a future release.

ratingMovies.title: Movies Ranking Number
ratingMovies.description:
The maximum level of movie content allowed on the device. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

Possible values, with the U.S. description of the rating level:

- '1000': All
- '500': NC-17
- '400': R
- '300': PG-13
- '200': PG
- '100': G
- '0': None

ratingTVShows.title: Allowed content ratings - TV Shows
ratingTVShows.description:
The maximum level of TV content allowed on the device. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

Possible values, with the U.S. description of the rating level:

- '1000': All
- '600': TV-MA
- '500': TV-14
- '400': TV-PG
- '300': TV-G
- '200': TV-Y7
- '100': TV-Y
- '0': None

allowExplicitContent.title: Allow Explicit Content
allowExplicitContent.description:
If 'false', the system hides explicit music or video content purchased from the iTunes Store. The system marks explicit content as such by content providers, such as record labels, when sold through the iTunes Store. Explicit content in the News and Podcast apps is also hidden.

Requires a supervised device in iOS 13 and later. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowFilesUSBDriveAccess.title: Allow Files USB Drive Access
allowFilesUSBDriveAccess.description: If 'false', the system prevents connecting to any connected USB devices in the Files app.

allowBookstoreErotica.title: Allow Bookstore Erotica
allowBookstoreErotica.description: If 'false', the system prevents the user from downloading Apple Books media that's tagged as erotica. Support for this restriction on unsupervised devices is deprecated.

allowPasswordSharing.title: Allow password sharing
allowPasswordSharing.description: If 'false', the system disables sharing passwords with the AirDrop passwords feature, or with the Passwords app.

allowPasswordProximityRequests.title: Allow proximity based password sharing requests
allowPasswordProximityRequests.description: If 'false', the system disables requesting passwords from nearby devices.

forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates.title: Defer Software Updates
forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates.description: If 'true', the system delays user visibility of software updates. In macOS, the system allows seed build updates without delay. The delay is 30 days unless you set 'enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay' to another value.

enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.title: Deferred Software Updates Delay
enforcedSoftwareUpdateDelay.description: How many days to delay a software update on the device. With this restriction in place, the user doesn't see a software update until the specified number of days after the software update release date. The restrictions 'forceDelayedAppSoftwareUpdates' and 'forceDelayedSoftwareUpdates' use this value.

allowRapidSecurityResponseInstallation.title: Allow Background Security Improvement Installation
allowRapidSecurityResponseInstallation.description: If 'false', the system prohibits installation of Background Security Improvements.

allowRapidSecurityResponseRemoval.title: Allow Background Security Improvement Removal
allowRapidSecurityResponseRemoval.description: If 'false', the system prohibits removal of Background Security Improvements.

allowFindMyDevice.title: Allow Find My Devices
allowFindMyDevice.description: If 'false', the system disables Find My Device in the Find My app.

allowFindMyFriends.title: Allow Find My Friends
allowFindMyFriends.description: If 'false', the system disables Find My Friends in the Find My app.

allowFilesNetworkDriveAccess.title: Allow Files Network Drive Access
allowFilesNetworkDriveAccess.description: If 'false', the system prevents connecting to network drives in the Files app.

allowESIMOutgoingTransfers.title: Allow eSIM Outgoing Transfers
allowESIMOutgoingTransfers.description: If 'false', prevents the transfer of an eSIM from the device on which the restriction is installed to a different device.

allowImagePlayground.title: Allow Image Playground
allowImagePlayground.description: If 'false', prohibits the use of image generation.

allowImageWand.title: Allow Image Wand
allowImageWand.description: If 'false', prohibits the use of Image Wand.

allowiPhoneMirroring.title: Allow iPhone mirroring
allowiPhoneMirroring.description: If 'false', prohibits the use of iPhone Mirroring. In macOS, this prevents the Mac from mirroring any iPhone. In iOS, this prevents the iPhone from mirroring to any Mac.

allowPersonalizedHandwritingResults.title: Allow personalized handwriting results
allowPersonalizedHandwritingResults.description: If false, prevents the system from generating text in the user's handwriting.

allowWritingTools.title: Allow writing tools
allowWritingTools.description: If 'false', disables Apple Intelligence writing tools.

allowMailSummary.description: If 'false', disables the ability to create summaries of email messages manually. This doesn't affect automatic summary generation.

allowMailSmartReplies.description: If 'false', disables smart replies in Mail.

allowRCSMessaging.description: If 'false', prevents the use of RCS messaging.

allowDefaultBrowserModification.title: Allow default browser modification
allowDefaultBrowserModification.description: If 'false', disables default browser preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default browser preference still works when applying this.

allowDefaultCallingAppModification.title: Allow default calling app modification
allowDefaultCallingAppModification.description: If 'false', disables default calling app preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default calling app preference still works when applying this.

allowDefaultMessagingAppModification.title: Allow default messaging app modification
allowDefaultMessagingAppModification.description: If 'false', disables default messaging app preference modification. The MDM Settings command to set the default messaging app preference still works when applying this.

allowExternalIntelligenceIntegrations.title: Allow external intelligence integrations
allowExternalIntelligenceIntegrations.description: If 'false', disables the use of external, cloud-based intelligence services with Siri. In iOS, this restriction is temporarily allowed on unsupervised and user enrollments. In a future release, this restriction will require supervision, and will be ignored on unsupervised devices.

allowExternalIntelligenceIntegrationsSig.title: Allow external intelligence integrations sign-in
allowExternalIntelligenceIntegrationsSig.description: If 'false', forces external intelligence providers into anonymous mode. If a user is already signed in to an external intelligence provider, applying this restriction signs them out when attempting the next request.

allowedExternalIntelligenceWorkspaceIDs.title: Allowed External Intelligence Workspace IDs
allowedExternalIntelligenceWorkspaceIDs.description: An array of strings, but currently restricted to a single element. If present, Apple Intelligence allows use of only the given external integration workspace ID, and requires a sign-in to make requests. The user is required to sign in to integrations that support signing in. Multiple payloads combine using an intersect operation. This means the allowed set of workspace IDs can become the empty set if multiple payloads specify conflicting values.

allowNotesTranscriptionSummary.description: If 'false', disables transcription summarization in Notes.

allowVisualIntelligenceSummary.title: Allow Visual Intelligence Summary
allowVisualIntelligenceSummary.description: If 'false', the system disables visual intelligence summarization.

allowSatelliteConnection.title: Allow use of satellite connectivity
allowSatelliteConnection.description: If 'false', the system prohibits the connection to and use of satellite services.

allowAppleIntelligenceReport.title: Allow Apple Intelligence Report
allowAppleIntelligenceReport.description: If 'false', the system disables Apple Intelligence reports.

allowSafariSummary.description: If 'false', the system disables the ability to summarize content in Safari.

allowVideoConferencingRemoteControl.title: Allow Video Conferencing Remote Control
allowVideoConferencingRemoteControl.description: If 'false', disables the ability for a remote FaceTime session to request control of the device.

allowSafariHistoryClearing.description: If 'false', the system disables the ability to clear browsing history in Safari.

allowSafariPrivateBrowsing.description: If 'false', the system disables the ability to use private browsing in Safari.

items.title: Denied ICCID for iMessage and FaceTime

deniedICCIDsForiMessageFaceTime.description: An array of strings representing ICCIDs of cellular plans. The device prevents use of any matching cellular networks in iMessage and FaceTime. The array must contain no more than 4 ICCID strings.

deniedICCIDsForRCS.description: An array of strings representing ICCIDs of cellular plans. The device prevents use of any matching cellular networks with RCS messaging. The array must contain no more than 4 ICCID strings.

ratingAppsExemptedBundleIDs.title: Apps Exempted from Rating Restrictions
ratingAppsExemptedBundleIDs.description: If present, the system exempts apps with bundle IDs in the array from age-based rating restrictions. The system uses intersection combine rules to combine multiple payloads and any exceptions that parental control apps provide, including ScreenTime.
